CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Leading Figures in Repeat Performance of "Aida" - Leading figures in repeat performance of "Aida," in Syria Mosque last Thursday evening. It was another artistic success.."
TitMainTitle: Informal group portrait of men and women wearing Egyptian costumes, seated in stairwell in Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
